tree.title: DynaFlex - Oscillator
tree.notes:
Important DBs:
DB1611 - Parameters DB
DB1619 - Internal statuses
DB1620 - HMI Interface

children.title: FC1600 (OB1)
children.flags: [false, false, false, false, false, false, false, false, false]

children.title: inline code NW2-NW9
children.notes:
setting simulations
all digital signals from hardware copied to DB1619 Osc_InternalValues.I_xxx
reading analog cylinder temperatures and hydraulic system pressure
settings all signals to OK in case of simulation

after BEU some weird calls to other blocks.
      OPN   "Osc_VersionDynaflex"
      OPN   "Osc_Cyl2, SnapShotData"
      UC    "Osc_ConvFactStrokeGain"
      UC    "Osc_ConvFeedForward"
      UC    "Osc_ConvButterwPar"
      UC    "Osc_ConvStrokePar"
      UC    "Osc_ConvManSetPosition"
      UC    "Osc_ControllerOscShape"
      UC    "Osc_ControlMovement"
      UC    "WAM_DPV1Com"

children.title: FC1635 CylSnamShot
children.description: Store Snap Shot of cylinder Data
children.notes:
To store the snapshot a data block is used. The structure DB is listed below:
DBW 0 - Pointer to data block
                0-399 snapshot active
                400 snapshot done
DBW 2-801 Cyl Set Position
DBW 802-1601 Act Position
DBW 1602-2401 Force raise cylinder
DBW 2402-3201 Valve set position
DBW 3202-4001 Valve act position

children.title: FC1637 MEX_FastData
children.notes:
Copies stroke and force values to Transfer Datablock.
Triggers Transfer to Mold Expert
